name: Game of Thrones Warband Mod
short_description:
This is a multiplayer mod for Mount and Blade Warband that is in the process of being created.

Mod will include:
New banners and multiplayer factions representing all the major houses of the Song of Ice and Fire Series (Lannister, Stark, Baratheon, Greyjoy, Tulley)

Redesigned character models with new skins, armour, weapons, and other items representing armor, weapons, and coats of arms from the series.

New maps for siege and Battle game modes from the Book series (Battle of the Camps, Whispering Wood, Oxcross, Siege of King's Landing, etc...)
